name: Lama Organized Neatly
description:
Lama Organized Neatly is a Puzzle Game inspired by the game "Cats Organized Neatly", where the player has to fit pieces of all different shapes and sizes into the play area.

The game has simple controls. Clicking and holding the left mouse button drags the cat across the screen, and right clicking will rotate it.

As always, I recommend playing the desktop version, as the browser version commonly has minor imperfections.

I made this game for fun, and it's not complete. However, all feedback is welcome. Thanks!
